title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Brazil 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes GDP growth compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is gradually increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and finally roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 3.55 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.51 was reported at Year 2014

The line rapidly increased by 596.08% from Year 2014 to 2015, and lastly, increased by 131.82% from Year 2019 to 2020.
